entry.title: Friday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this evening. Snow mixed with ice pellets overnight. Blowing snow over exposed areas after midnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming southeast 50 km/h gusting to 80 near midnight. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 14 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries or rain showers. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or drizzle changing to flurries in the morning. Blowing snow over exposed areas late in the morning and in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 70 near noon. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the evening then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow over exposed areas early in the evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 10 February 2023
